SELECT SUM(CREAT_CO) AS statsCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) AS statsDate
FROM COMTS_BBS_SUMMARY WHERE 1 = 1
AND OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} AND STATS_SE = #{statsKind}
AND DETAIL_STATS_SE = #{detailStatsKind}
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)

GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)

SELECT c.topNtcepersonId FROM (SELECT COUNT(a.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , a.NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTN_BBS a , COMTN_BBS_MASTER b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND a.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND b.BBS_TY_CODE = #{detailStatsKind} GROUP BY a.NTCR_ID) c WHERE c.topNtcepersonCo = (SELECT MAX(f.topNtcepersonCo) FROM (SELECT COUNT(d.NTT_ID) AS topNtcepersonCo , d.NTCR_ID AS topNtcepersonId FROM COMTN_BBS d , COMTN_BBS_MASTER e WHERE d.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID AND d.NTCR_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(d.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND e.BBS_TY_CODE = #{detailStatsKind} GROUP BY d.NTCR_ID) f ) AND rownum = 1
